EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Dear {{lead.First Name:default=Sir/Madam}},
You received our last email but didn't click so we're asking for your quick feedback to help us determine how we can provide content you'll enjoy. Would you take a few seconds to answer the 2 questions in this questionnaire <http://www.surveymonkey.com/s/YXHKKVZ> ?
Thank you,
VMTurbo Team Click here <http://www.vmturbo.com/gain-control-cloud-virtualized-environments?source=email> for Brief overview of VMTurbo
